extra_description: *FOUR BEDROOMS* *NO CHAIN* *MODERN END TOWNHOUSE* *CLOSE TO IDLE MOOR* *QUIET CUL-DE-SAC* *VERY POPULAR LOCATION* *FAMILY HOME* *CLOSE TO EXCELLENT SCHOOLS & AMENITIES* *GARDENS* *GARAGE & PARKING* Townend Estate Agents offer for sale this FOUR BEDROOM modern end town house. Situated on a quiet cul-de-sac in a popular residential area. Close to excellent local primary and secondary schools as well as the amenities of Idle village. Just a short stroll onto Idle Moor, giving the property a semi-rural feel, as well as just a short drive from Apperley Bridge with its train station, marina, river & canal side walks. This desirable family home benefits from gas central heating, UPVC double glazing, gardens front & rear, off street parking and garage.The accommodation is planned over three floors and comprises: Ground floor: Entrance hall, Lounge with French doors to rear garden, Kitchen fitted with a range of base & wall units, Cloaks W/C. First Floor: Three good sized bedrooms, family bathroom with three piece suite. Second Floor: Bedroom Four and modern bathroom with shower cubicle. Externally to the rear is an enclosed garden, with garage, parking and smaller garden to the front.

extra_description: * INNER TOWN HOUSE * THREE BEDROOMS * CUL-DE-SAC LOCATION * FAMILY SIZED *  * WELL PRESENTED * GARDENS & PARKING *  This family sized town house occupies a delightful cul-de-sac location and offers 'ready to move into' accommodation.  Benefits from gas central heating, upvc double glazing and alarm system.  The property briefly comprises entrance hall, lounge, fitted dining kitchen, three first floor bedrooms and house bathroom with white suite.  To the outside there is parking to the front and an enclosed rear garden.  Viewing recommended.Entrance - Lounge - 4.67m x 3.66m (15'4" x 12') - With a coal effect gas fire in modern fireplace surround, radiator, French doors to dining kitchen.Dining Kitchen - 4.60m x 3.15m (15'1" x 10'4") - Modern walnut effect fitted kitchen having a range of wall and base units incorporating stainless steel sink unit, stainless steel oven and hob, tiled floor, upvc French doors to rear garden.First Floor Landing - Bedroom One - 3.86m x 2.82m (12'8" x 9'3") - With built in wardrobes and radiator.Bedroom Two - 3.58m x 2.74m (11'9" x 9') - With radiator.Bedroom Three - 2.44m x 1.83m (8' x 6') - With radiator.Bathroom - White three piece suite, tiled walls and towel radiator.Exterior - To the outside there is parking to the front and an enclosed well stocked garden to the rear.Directions - From our office in Idle village take the right at the roundabout at the bottom of the High Street onto New Street, continue onto Apperley Rd, turn left onto Fourlands Dr, left onto Fourlands Gardens and the property will shortly be seen displayed via our For Sale board.Tenure - FREEHOLDCouncil Tax Band - B

address: Dorper House, Beck View Way, Shipley
extra_description: * CALL SUGDENS TO BE THE FIRST TO VIEW *  * MODERN GROUND FLOOR APARTMENT * ONE BEDROOM * OPEN PLAN LOUNGE/KITCHEN *  * ALLOCATED PARKING * MODERN FIXTURES & FITTINGS * CLOSE TO SHIPLEY TRAIN STATION *  A fantastic opportunity for the first time buyer, investor or downsizer to purchase this extremely well presented ground floor apartment.  Built approximately four years ago and benefits from upvc double glazing and electric wall heaters.  The manageable accommodation  briefly comprises communal entrance, reception hall, open plan lounge/kitchen, double bedroom and modern bathroom with white suite.  To the outside there are communal gardens and allocated parking.Communal Entrance - Accessed via intercom.Reception Hall - With electric storage heater.Open Plan Lounge/Kitchen - 5.99m x 4.27m (19'8" x 14') - Kitchen area has a range of modern wall and base units incorporating stainless steel sink unit, plumbing for auto washer.Lounge area has an electric storage heater.Bedroom - 3.84m x 2.79m (12'7" x 9'2") - With electric storage heater.Bathroom - Modern three piece white suite, part tiled walls and heated towel rail.Exterior - To the outside there are communal gardens and allocated parking.Directions - From our office in Idle village proceed straight ahead at the roundabout at the bottom of the High Street and continue to the top, here turn right onto Town Ln, at Thackley Corner junction turn left onto Leeds Rd/A657, after 1.6 miles turn left onto Carr Ln/B6149, right onto Crag Rd/B6149, after 0.3 miles take the slight right onto Briggate/B6149, turn right onto Beck View Way and Dorper House will be seen on the right hand side.Tenure - LEASEHOLD.  999 years from 2019.  Monthly ground rent/service charge £49.75 - includes buildings insurance.Council Tax Band - APlease Note - This property has a video tour.  This video tour is for illustrative purposes only and we strongly recommend a viewing of any property before committing to a purchase and incurring costs.  (If you are viewing the tour on a Smart/Iphone you may have turn the phone to landscape mode to see the full picture).

extra_description: * OFFERED WITH NO CHAIN * LOVELY FIRST TIME PURCHASE/YOUNG FAMILY HOME * Situated within this popular residential area just off Moore Avenue, BD6 is this traditional SEMI DETACHED. Briefly comprising: Entrance porch leading to hallway, lounge, dining kitchen and CONSERVATORY. TWO DOUBLE BEDROOMS and family bathroom. Externally are good size gardens to the front, driveway leading to garage and larger than average gardens to the rear. Well placed for many amenities Wibsey village has to offer including schools, shops and commute to the city center. VIEWING ADVISED

* SPACIOUS THREE BEDROOM SEM DETACHED * POPULAR HAWORTH ROAD IN BD9 * TWO RECEPTION ROOMS * CONSERVATORY * Whitney's are pleased to offer to the market this good-sized family home that benefits from gas central heating, UPVC double glazing, drive for several cars and potential to add value. Sold with NO CHAIN and briefly comprising of: UPVC entrance porch, entrance hall, lounge, dining room, kitchen, conservatory, three bedrooms & bathroom. Low maintenance gardens to front and rear and ample off-road parking.
PORCH  A good sized UPVC porch to the side elevation with tiled floor and a UPVC door leading into the hallway. 
ENTRANCE HALL  Stairs off to the first floor, window to the side and a central heating radiator. 
LOUNGE 13' 8" x 12' 3" (4.17m x 3.73m) Bay window to the front elevation, stone fireplace with inset living flame gas fire and tiled hearth, two wall light points and  two central heating radiators. 
DINING ROOM 11' 1" x 10' 7" (3.38m x 3.23m) Open to the kitchen. French doors and windows leading to the conservatory, under-stairs store and a central heating radiator. 
KITCHEN 10' 6" x 5' 0" (3.2m x 1.52m) Fitted with a range of base and wall units, laminated work surfaces and splash-back tiling. Integrated gas gob, electric oven and a stainless steel sink and drainer with mixer tap. Window to the side elevation and the central heating boiler. 
CONSERVATORY 9' 10" x 6' 0" (3m x 1.83m) White UPVC conservatory with French doors leading to the garden and a utility area with washing machine plumbing, space for a tumble dryer and work surface space. 
FIRST FLOOR  
BEDROOM ONE 14' 6" x 12' 3" (4.42m x 3.73m) Bay window to the front elevation, central heating radiator and wall-to-wall fitted wardrobes with sliding doors.
BEDROOM TWO 9' 6" x 9' 6" (2.9m x 2.9m) Window to the rear and a central heating radiator. 
BEDROOM THREE 8' 3" x 6' 7" (2.51m x 2.01m) Window to the rear, store cupboard and a central heating radiator.
BATHROOM 6' 9" x 6' 4" (2.06m x 1.93m) Double width walk-in shower with glass sliding door and thermostatic shower, pedestal washbasin and a WC. Window to the side elevation, part tiled walls and a central heating radiator. 
EXTERNAL  To the front of the property is off-road parking for several cars, flower bed with mature shrubs & trees plus a low maintenance gravel area. To the rear is a car port, flagged patio, flower bed and and concreted area.

extra_description: This is a great opportunity to purchase this immaculately presented THREE BEDROOM, TWO RECEPTION ROOM End Townhouse. LARGE PRIVATE FRONT GARDENS with a DRIVEWAY AND GARAGE TO THE REAR.  Situated close to good local schooling, amenities, city centre and transport links. IDEAL FOR FIRST PURCHASE, INVESTMENT OR THE GROWING FAMILY.This is a great opportunity to purchase this immaculately presented THREE BEDROOM, TWO RECEPTION ROOM End Townhouse. LARGE PRIVATE FRONT GARDENS with a DRIVEWAY AND GARAGE TO THE REAR.  Situated close to good local schooling, amenities, city centre and transport links. IDEAL FOR FIRST PURCHASE, INVESTMENT OR THE GROWING FAMILY.Comprising of Entrance hallway leading into a spacious lounge with gas fire and large bay window. A separate dining/reception room with a gas fire and French Doors. The kitchen having a selection of wall and base units with side access.The first floor holds two double bedrooms and an ample sized third. The bathroom has a modern white three piece suite. Main access to the property is to the rear via Princes Crescent off Kings Road. There is a paved driveway and detached garage. The front garden is privately enclosed with fenced boundaries, being set back and elevated from the roadside. Having a good sized lawned garden with mature tree and shrub borders and a decked area, ideal for sitting out on those summer evenings.Viewings recommended to truly appreciate the quality the property has to offer!!
